'''1.1.3 build 2''' (also known as '''alpha 1.1.3.1''') is the second and final build released for [[Pocket Edition 1.1.3|1.1.3]].<ref>{{citation|url=http://pocketbeta.minecraft.net/2017/06/changelog-for-113-beta-build-1-2.html|title=Minecraft: Beta Changelogs: Changelog for 1.1.3 beta build 1 & 2|website=pocketbeta.minecraft.net}}</ref> This is the final alpha released in 2017.

== Fixes ==

* Fixed for crashes and stability</onlyinclude>

== Trivia ==
* This is the last alpha build for a version as alpha builds were replaced by beta builds upon the release of [[beta 1.2.0.2]] on July 31, 2017.
